description: To create a STIP file, edit your sound in the application, click SAVE in the User Preset area, name your sound, click OK , the "Parent Sound" will now be located in the "BROWSER" area with a black triangle next to it, the created STIP file name will appear under the "Parent Sound" when you click on the triangle, and the STIP file will be located in the folder of its "Parent Sound."
You can also rename or delete any of your User Preset STIP files by selecting the RENAME or DELETE buttons in the User Preset area.
